ModMetaData.name: Deep And Deeper
ModMetaData.author: Shashlichnik ;p (aka Шашлычник ;р)
ModMetaData.description:
Out of steel? Neighbours not selling components? Your last plasteel chunk insect occupied? Empire take your last piece of Gold you needed to build a Multi-Analyzer?
No problems! Go low and dig deeper! Join the Deep Divers!
Don't let the promise of riches cloud your vision, and who knows what will be right behind that rock wall... There are Riches to be found, underground! (Just don't try to build a base down there, just trust me, okay?)
Rock and Stone!
